newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy's Turin sees October CPI at x.x pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Italy's Turin sees October CPI at x.x pct yr/yr.

text.p: The Italian city of Turin said its October consumer price index stood at 0.3 percent month-on-month and 2.8 percent year-on-year.
In September, Turin's inflation rate was 0.1 percent and 2.9 percent respectively.
Turin is one of 10 Italian cities publishing inflation data on Monday and Tuesday.
The city's CPI has a weighting of 8.81 percent on the national index. The 10 sample cities have a combined weighting of 69.67 percent on the total index.
